{{champion:122}} {{champion:19}} Forgot a few
Good sir these abilities do NOT scale with missing health. If you hit Darius or Warwick ult on a max health target, it will do the same damage as with a low health target.
No Darius' is an execute...  Same with Jinx.
No? Darius does true damage that scales up based on his passive stacks on the target. it doesnt have a %Increased damage based on %missing health, which is what makes up an execute.
can't forget the {{champion:92}} ult
{{champion:202}} {{champion:45}}  arent fighters, but the ult is similar
what about {{champion:64}}?  Q_Q

For those of you who don't know, she will be having her late game base damage lowered on her Q and E, but the AD ratios will be higher on said abilities. 
This will force her to defer from building tank, as it will keep her early game the same, but cause her to fall off late game if she doesn't build damage. I imagine her core will remain {{item:3071}} and {{item:3748}}, but expect to see less tank items ({{item:3075}} {{item:3065}}, {{item:3143}}, {{item:1401}}, etc.) and more damage items, while probably going for health ({{item:3053}}, {{item:1400}}, {{item:3022}} maybe?). Some will probably try to build her assassin ({{item:3142}}, {{item:3147}}, {{item:3814}}, {{item:3156}}), but I'm not sure how that would work out. 
I know a lot of you feel tempted to call "Captain Obvious" when looking at the second paragraph, but I was just feeling nostalgic about when I first started playing League and decided to help out any newbies who weren't sure what to think when they saw something like this and weren't sure how to ask about it.

This is even helpful to **non**noobs too, these builds look like fun, thanks for the recommendations , gonna miss the old tankier style though. I might go more lifesteal route though like {{item:3812}} and {{item:3153}} in there too, just to last longer in team fights or battles for objectives
I honestly hadn't even thought about lifesteal, thanks for reminding me! Also gonna miss tank'sai, I'm mastery level 5 with her :P

> Also gonna miss tank'sai

I am **definitely not** going to miss tank'sai :/ This change should bring her back into being a creature to be feared; I want my enemies to hear that scream and crap their pants. She's not currently pulling that off by being a tank-initiator annoyance.

I'll gladly lose the global map presence if it means she can be a killer of men again.
I can see where you're coming from, but I'll mostly miss it for nostalgia's sake, rather than because I prefer one over the other.

Honestly I feel like a core of {{item:3071}} into {{item:1413}} and then {{item:3053}} will be the best build for her.Still going tanky after with say {{item:3742}} and {{item:3065}} but a bruiser based start as opposed to full tank.

So then, what do you say would be a good overall build? I've been racking my brain for this for the past few days trying to prepare myself. As a {{champion:421}} main, I'm very excited about this update, but confused as to what items may be the best to run.

It seems the idea is "do better for building more ad, be punished for building tank," which seems to rule bruiser build out. Here's what I initially thought would be good:

{{item:1401}} first, into {{item:3111}} or{{item:3047}} depending, then {{item:3071}} (or {{item:3742}})? for a start. Then rounding out a bruiser build with something like {{item:3053}} {{item:3022}}. 

From what it seems however, perhaps starting {{item:1400}} instead, building{{item:3071}} and then going into {{item:3153}} and so on.

Sorry for such a long reply, but I'm genuinely trying to create an item set for her. I really want to adjust properly and don't want to be left in the dark when the update hits.

Thanks for any help or suggestions.

{{champion:421}} approves. Rekt'Son. Get'Rekt. Rek'NRoll. Get'Shrekt. The Rekmeister. The Rekoning. Move over Warwick, there's a new Diver in town. Now all I need is a Hextech Crafting Exclusive Rek'Sai skin. Plz Riot! The Queen has returned!
warek?
Rek'Sigh
er.... isn't her ultimate basically just a Warwick Q? Does the range get longer or something with levels?
Her ultimate has more than 4x the range of Warwick Q (1500 vs. 350), hits harder, deals damage based on missing health rather than max health, and doesn't heal her.
a LOT harder.

By that logic, all of these abilities are just Garen Qs:
{{champion:266}} E and R
{{champion:53}} E
{{champion:122}} E
{{champion:119}} Q
{{champion:245}} E
{{champion:114}} E
{{champion:105}} W
{{champion:3}} Passive
{{champion:86}} Q
{{champion:79}} E
{{champion:75}} Q
Etc, etc, you get the idea. NO, Rek's new ultimate is not "basically just a Warwick Q".

Haha! My argument Rek't you! And...that's how I validate myself...still, Rekt!..._sigh_ what have I dont with my life?

my favorite part of this was the Garen picture in the middle there, lol. I mean, yeah, I suppose Garen's Q is basically just a Garen Q =-)

Don't bullshit here, we all know Nasus is just a Garen rework they decided to sell as a new champ. They pulled the same shit with Spirit Guard Udyr. Damn you Rito..

I look forward to this rework, I actually had the same idea when she was out with giving her a leap like mechanic, and this turned out to no disappointment. 

I wonder if top rek'sai could be a thing again. More True damage, more mobility with the tunnels, %health execute, I could see fighter rek'sai being an ok pick again for top lane, and if the PBE showed us anything, she'll be a great jungler again.

All I want is for the ult to be global. I like the Idea of seeing a top laner tp away but tagging them before they finish just for them to hear that shriek and see reksai fly across the map all the way to bot lane. I know this is how it works with warwick q but I really just want to see reksai fly over the midlane, maybe smite a minion on the way (gotta tax those yasuos) and end up bot lane as the enemy adc and support start screaming at their top laner for bringing a monster.... Just some really niche things that would make the ult a little more fun and exciting. I mean, who didn't like it when vi could follow you back to base when you recall.

Also, making it global would kinda fit the cinematic a bit better as well while it wouldn't break the game because you would still have to tag the person with damage in order to follow up on it.
In the first sentence of the Ferocious Predator or Helpful Wingwoman section, the word should be "strike" instead of "strikes".
no, ferocious predator is singular, so it should be "strikes"
why are talking about lexicon and sentences formulas, we are here to admire the void waifu
this debate is quite extraordinary (insert gentleman cho-gath sticker here)
Pretty sure at first they were going to say "who strikes" but then added the should.  Just a typo.

Fantastic. Now can she have her old knockup range back?

I would expect one sooner or later. I'm positive Rek'Sai's overhaul was announced before Kindred's latest (PBE) revamp, so just give it some time!
